resources.string: The server certificate is not signed by a known Certificate Authority.\n\n%s
The authenticity of host "%1$s" can\'t be established.\n%2$s key fingerprint is %3$s.

The host key of "%1$s" has changed. Someone could be eavesdropping on you right now (man-in-the-middle attack)!

It is also possible that the host key has just been changed.
The fingerprint for the %2$s key sent by the remote host is %3$s.
